title: 1908–09 in Scottish football
text:
The 1908–09 season was the 36th season of competitive <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in Scotland and the 19th season of the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish Football League</a>.
Scottish League Division One.
Champions: Celtic
Scottish Cup.
The Scottish Cup was withheld by the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20Association">Scottish Football Association</a> after a riot following the replay between finalists Rangers and Celtic.
Other honours.
County.
. *replay **second replay
Junior Cup.
<a href="Kilwinning%20Rangers%20F.C.">Kilwinning Rangers</a> won the Junior Cup after a 1–0 win over <a href="Strathclyde%20F.C.">Strathclyde</a> in a replayed final.
Scotland national team.
Key:
